name: IT201_Project01_Jalen_Wyatt
description:
This project allows the user to paint a blank canvas with 3D objects!

There are setting for shape consisting of "Cube", Sphere", and "Cylinder".

Settings for size which consists of "Small", "Medium", and "Large.

And settings for color consisting of "Red", "Cyan", "Yellow", "Green", "Blue", "Purple", "Black", and "White".

See what you can create with the options and combinations and when you're done, just simply end game!
